name: Golden Moon
description:
Golden Moon is an old school, 3D Third-Person exploration game about finding treasure and working your way past ancient robots, booby-traps, and other menaces.

Researchers find an entrance to a previously undiscovered tomb and dispatch
a team of archaeologists to document new findings. You, the player, are a member of this team.

Windstorms, and a lack of new finds, batter the equipment and the pocketbooks of the team.
In order to convince investors to continue funding the project, you, need to prove this unexplored area to be something worth investigating.

It is the dead of night. Looking out of your tent into the darkness, your heart pounds with excitement as you are about to begin your exploration adventure!

However, having no idea what dangers you will face, you do know that re-entering the tomb will leave you far from any campsite comforts . . .
